headline: Mantle Ridge Issues Shareholder Letter: Restoring Integrity is Necessary for Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. to Recover and Return to Prosperity
summary: Mantle Ridge LP, which, together with its affiliates (collectively, "Mantle Ridge"), beneficially owns approximately $1.3 billion of the outstanding common shares of Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (NYSE: APD) ("Air Products" or the "Company"), today sent a letter to the Company's shareholders detailing significant omissions, obfuscations, and misleading claims from Air Products' incumbent leadership regarding its own performance, strategy, and key projects.
